text: Hazael weere iri ịnyịnya kamel anọ buru ezi ihe niile si nʼala Damaskọs,8:9 Damaskọs, bụ isi obodo dị mkpa ebe a na-azụ ahịa, nke dị nʼetiti mba Ijipt, na Eshịa nke mpaghara Tọki na Mesopotamịa. wetara Ịlaisha onyinye ndị a sị ya, “Nwa gị Ben-Hadad, eze Aram, zitere ka m jụọ gị sị, ‘M ga-esi nʼọrịa a bilie?’ ”
